links_Review_Title: Perfect if you just want to feel girly & pretty!
links_Review_Text: I put this dress on and made my husband play photographer with me around the neighborhood during quarantine. Such a great mood booster!
I loved wearing this for the fun of it! I felt like a pirate princess. The only negative is the boning in the corset poked me a little.
Perfect fit. VERY comfy. Can be made more formal or causal. Love!
I thought this turned out edgy which I love. No pockets :/ and the buttons toward the bottom are fake. But overall super comfy and cute.
Does beautiful. The corset/waist has structure but just the right amount so it is not restricting in hot weather. Wore it out for dinner in Tulum. Fabric is quality, flows beautiful. Love love love!!
So flattering and fits so well! Got so many compliments, would 100% rent again.

This dress looked great in the bodice. Every other part of the dress was a disaster on me. The little sleeves are elastic all the way around and were tight on my arms. They also didn't give that sexy, off the shoulder look, because the elastic kept them in an awkward location on my bicep. The bottom the dress was very "saloon girl." I thought it would be nice for a beach vacation, but it just didn't work on me.
This is a great vacation dress but if you are a C cup or larger you will need to size up. I'm a solid size 4, but couldn't get it zipped. Had to get the 6.

The wedding I was going to wear this to was postponed due to COVID, but I still tried on the dress to cheers the grooms from afar! It fit perfectly, felt formal enough for a wedding because of the gorgeous embroidery, and flows so nicely no matter how you stand or sit.

links_Review_Title: OBSESSED- dress up or down its perfect!
links_Review_Text: I LOVE this dress. The floral embroidery all over the dress is stunning. The XS was a tad big, but I made it work. I paired with white heels and then again with a leather jacket and some golden goose sneakers. I wore it to the office but it would be great for a wedding, spring date night, really anything!
Received tons of compliments. Perfect for an outdoor reception in Miami.
Thought this would be a more casual dress than it was, didn't end up wearing it because it was too thick and the straps were too big but would love to rent again for a more formal occasion.

Obsessed. This dress is gorgeous and very good quality. It was a bit big in the waist, so maybe would size down if you're small there. Got so many compliments and it photographed beautifully. Also pretty comfy!

Pretty dress, great length. It was a little cold here so I put a sweater on top. Can be worn with dress shoes as well as it is slightly formal material-wise. True to size and you can wear a standard bra. Two things: the buttons down the front are a very shiny gold color, which threw me a little and the material is slightly heavy and stiff. Now that's probably why it keeps its form and doesn't wrinkle. But not a "light and flowy" dress if that's what you're expecting!
Loved the dress and fit! The fabric and embroidery work was just superb ! The only complaint was that the straps were too long and kept slipping off. Beautiful dress!
The fit on this is very flattering. Button detail is cute. Gorgeous embroidery. Lots of compliments
very stiff fabric
Body fit perfect but straps were way too long. Bigger bust might help with that, but not for medium/small chested women
This dress looks more like upholstery or drape material. I was very surprised by how thick and embroidered the material was, and it didn't fit my petite frame at all.

links_Review_Title: Most heinous dress I have ever seen
links_Review_Text: If you want to look like a grandma on a cruise, rent this dress. Your curves will be accentuated just where you want them to be, your thighs and upper arms, making your body look 15 pounds heavier

This dress is very high quality. Heavy material with amazing red flowers embroidered over it. It is heavy so may be too warm for a hot day but perfect for spring. I'm larger in the bust and sized up to the L and it fit perfect. This would be a great dress to wear to attend a wedding. Because it is so heavy and crisp I think it would be too much for a casual event. Very flattering and slimming fit.

This dress is an absolute compliment-magnet. The flowers are vibrant and the buttons make it easy to pair with gold jewelry. Note that it is not silk but some kind of polyester, so while it is easy to travel with (no wrinkles) it is stiff and heavy. It would be way too hot for a summer wedding, IMO. Fit was true to size but tight around the rib cage.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but definitely runs large in the chest
links_Review_Text: The embroidery on this is beautiful I just wish I would have sizes down.
this is a gorgeous dress with beautiful floral brocade fabric. it was heavier and fancier than i anticipated so i didn't wear to my more casual event.

links_Review_Title: 💛 BRIGHTEN ANY EVENT WITH THIS BUTTERFLY BEAUTY
links_Review_Text: Wow, gorgeous in person! Very, very bright yellow yet managed not to cross over into tackiness (IMO). At first glance fairly conservative, but the sheer skirt with partial mini slip brings a sexiness to it (especially if there is a bright light source behind you). The adjustable straps were a bonus - I was initially skeptical as they looked a little wimpy, but the dress fit so nicely the straps didn't have to do much work. Fit TTS, if in doubt I'd size up. I would definitely rent this again to wear to a wide range events from daily to formal. Looking forward to trying this brand again, this was my first. For my other RTR looks find me on Instagram: agentcheryl

This dress is STUNNING! It's classy but unique. The color makes it really stand out. The bodice has boning and fits snug so size up if you're bustier as there isn't a lot of room in the chest. This dress in particular had already had a strap repair and the strap (which is like cloth ribbon) was fraying and detaching but overall one of my favorite rentals! I rented just to try on but am going to rent it again for a rehearsal dinner in May

links_Review_Title: Ordered on 3/14 and never got to wear it. Beautiful nonetheless!
links_Review_Text: Snug up top.
Loved the color and length! It fit perfect. It does have padding in the bra which is one thing I didn't like about it but otherwise really comfortable!
Fit was good, looked beautiful on.
Comfortable and super figure-flattering! This was so comfortable that I didn't feel as if I was wearing such a formal dress. Lots of compliments. Rent this dress for a formal spring or summer affair!
Rented for wedding, fits snug but that's the design. Would rent again. Note liner only goes mid thigh.
This dress fits in all the right places and hides your imperfections. I wore it to a rehearsal cocktail hour and it was perfect. I would love to rent this again for the future.

This dress is amazing, the color is more beautiful in person. The top is padded like a corset. I would suggest to size up if you're on the bustier side. I wore this to an event and got so may compliments. I will definitively rent this again

I tried two sizes and they fit overall expect for the band around the waist which is unbearably tight. The rest of the dress is starting to get too big as I size up but the waist band is still not fitting. So sad because it's really pretty, May try one more size up...

Gorgeous! I got a size 2 (I can do a 0 through 4) and couldn't zip it up. I am going to try a 6 but fear the waist will be too large as it was only super tight on the bust. May be ideal for a smaller bust.
This dress is GORGEOUS in person. Super feminine and fun. It would be perfect for a prom, formal or summer wedding

links_Review_Title: I got the items fast and nicely packaged!
links_Review_Text: Such a great and flattering fit! Nice fabrics although the lining is polyester and the outer fabric is silk it's still very comfortable. It's lightweight and easy to move in too!

Unique dress that is perfect for a virtual party (during quarantine). Color pops and photographs beautifully. Beautiful to wear. A little low cut/short and the bunches make the dress a little less slimming than it could be, but still flattering.
Loved this for a bridal luncheon. The shoulders definitely pop more than expected but it was beautiful. The rouche details on the waist are really nice too.

I rented this dress for a red dress charity gala, it was the perfect dress for the occasion. I usually wear a 4 or 6 in dresses and the 6 fit perfectly. Such a trendy high quality dress. Would definitely rent again if I have the occasion!

It was perfect for an awards ceremony where attire was described as "Spring Wedding". I love that it's a great silk and was very comfortable and flattering! Loved the flare at the bottom and how it accentuated my figure!

I was so looking forward to this dress but will not wear it. It is simply two sheer layers of fabric so it is see through. A summer only dress. The ruffle above knee is only one layer so it shows too much leg if taller. Fit a little snug compared to all other 6s I have rented.
Form fitting and sharp dress, I like the wild elements like the curvy straps. This dress brought me joy. Close to purchasing because I don't want to return it.

The dress is cute but the straps are too long. I would have had to pin them if I actually wore it. It also runs a little small. I am a 2, barely and it was snug. May want to size up if you are shapely. Too much of a hassle so I returned. Wrinkles easily also

links_Review_Title: I wanted to love it, but too many things to complain about.
links_Review_Text: Okay this dress is HEAVY, which means it will be hot in the summer (very denim like.) If you don't have relatively significant boobs, forget about it. The length is rather awkward, but maybe that's just me. Overall, I really wanted to love this fit and was left rather disappointed.

If I could buy this, I would! It's a little big, but in a comfortable way. Super flattering and great color. Elastic waist and the buttons make it really easy to take it off and on. Can't wait to wear this out when quarantine is over!!
Unlike most jumpers this runs long in the body. It's also pretty sheer so bathing suit or well coordinated undergarments are key. I'm going to reorder one size down. Hoping then it will be perfect!

Flowy, comfy and adorable. I probably could have gone down a size or two but this was all they had available. The waist is stretchy and there's a tie to make it tighter so that made it work. Will def be renting this again.
Perfect vaca romper. It is comfy and flowy, vibrant and colorful!! It is such a beautiful piece. I'd buy it if it weren't so expensive!! It was so perfect for a night out on my Caribbean vacation.

I gave it 4 stars because it's VERY low cut and I safety pinned the front. And the straps are VERY long and I had to safety pin them back. I'm a giant and a 30E so if this dress doesn't fit my shoulders and boobs, it won't fit anyone. But the material is super soft and it's a nice casual day dress. On talk girls it's still flattering enough. On short girls, this will be a maxi.

I loved this dress even though I couldn't wear it.. the straps were too long and there was no way to adjust them.. not sure if a size smaller would be helpful.. the dress fit perfect everywhere else.. worth a try.

Fits loose but cinches nicely at the waist. Might overwhelm a petite person. Great length for tall girls. Subtle high-low hemline. Cotton wrinkles easily but would be super comfortable in hot weather. Got loads of complements!

I normally wear a small but I guess RTR only had a medium at the time so I gave it a try. It was swimming on me, even with the belt. I really like this dress though and would try to rent in an x-small. I would size down.
Poor fit

links_Review_Title: To. much fabric, was to big to wear
links_Review_Text: to big
I liked this throw on leopard dress. It was roomy and I probably could have sized down. I wore it with the matching jacket but I could have thrown a blazer on with it too.

links_Review_Title: So nice I wore it twice
links_Review_Text: This was a great draft to both dress up or dress down. I wore it once like this and another time with a black T underneath.

Love this dress! The slits on the side are a touch high, so if you're tall they may be too high for a more conservative setting. I am 5'2"'and it's a true midi dress on me. I took a size 2, and it fits great. Straps are not adjustable, FYI but it wasn't an issue for me. Love for work, could also be dressed for a night out. Will definitely rent again.
I fell in love with this dress! Belted it for some shape. I also wore a second time with a black tee under for more casual look.

links_Review_Title: A true desk to dinner piece!
links_Review_Text: My cat loves when I dress in print of her larger big cat cousin, the leopard. Wore it with a chambray shirt and Guatemalan belt, tights (winter). Great dress, sexy high thigh slit on either leg (that I didn't get to take advantage of bc of aforementioned winter). Will likely rent again!
Too small!!!

links_Review_Title: The most comfortable dress!!! So cute!
links_Review_Text: It's one of those dresses that is super flattering and makes you feel really confident!! A wedding is 10x more fun when you love what you're wearing, and this dress is 10000% guarantee of that! So sad to send it back.
Couldn't wear at all because it didn't fit over my hips.
Pretty dress

links_Review_Title: So beautiful, but very small through the hips
links_Review_Text: Fabric, style, & print are gorgeous, but it was at least 1 size too small through the hips. I'll likely rent again and size up.

links_Review_Title: Love, love, love this-beautiful fabric, light weight and feminine
links_Review_Text: Will order again 2 sizes up
Obviously from the photo you can see it's pretty big on me. I should've gone with my gut and sized down. I am willing to try again but I doubt I could wear it to work.

links_Review_Title: Can't decide if I like it
links_Review_Text: So its a quality top, but the placing of the elastic makes it a bit weird. I wore a belt for some definition. I got lots of compliments, but I don't know if I liked it. Def not for tall girls, unless you want to show belly. i kept pulling it down.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love, but runs large
links_Review_Text: I loved the style of this top, but it definitely runs large and I wasn't able to wear it. Maybe I can try again in the medium.
Loved it!
Great fit and style.
Was too big so I didn't wear it. Ordered a L could have easily worn the M. Off white in color and very pretty.

links_Review_Title: Super cute for work or with jeans!
links_Review_Text: The v neck is a little more open that I thought it would be, but it still looks good with work pants. Would be really cute with jeans and dressed down as well.

This is a very comfortable and flattering top; however, I would suggest sticking with your normal size or smaller. I ordered a large thinking that the stomach area looked fitted in the picture, and it was very oversized, and I felt like I could have easily sized down.

Shirt looked as expected, but I didn't find it totally flattering for my figure. True white, nice material, felt like a quality piece. I think it runs true to size (I am 5'5", 118 lbs and the XS fit just snug at the elastic waistband). However, it's overall amount of fabric overhwhelmed me. Plenty of room for large busts, and does not show too much cleavage, but would work best for those with very small waists/larger hips. May also be better for taller, wispy types and could look great with a belt.
Beautiful draping white blouse that is well made and well designed. Paired it with a fancy scarf and skinny black pants. Love!!
Ran very large. Despite my 36DD too was far too large. Also the bottom of the shirt is more peplum than appears on model
Super pretty, full of joy, will rent again

I got so many compliments on this bright dress. It fits surprisingly well for my large chest. Tight in the East and nice slut in the front for easy walking. Would buy this dress! Definitely worth renting!!

links_Review_Title: So pretty! A little low cut for me. Wore it at home for Easter during stay at home orders.
links_Review_Text: Most beautiful colors and fits like a glove. I am pretty small and it fit me like it was made for me!
I wore this in San Juan and it was a great vacation dress. Photographs well, flattering. Be warned that the top runs a bit large and it's a bit sheer.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear; pretty but very busy and odd fit

links_Review_Text: Gorgeous figure flattering dress. The colors are quite stunning. But it was a little too diaphanous for me, and would probably be a better option later in spring. The slit in the front is very high and the neckline is very low - definitely would not wear for a professional social setting.

links_Review_Title: Do not rent as a dress!
links_Review_Text: I rented this as a dress, only to find out the bottom half is completely sheer (and see-thru). The front slit is so high that it pretty much exposes everything from the hips down, also making wearing a slip impossible. If you wore this as a tunic or pool cover-up, it would be fine. Arms are a little snug.

Flattering even over the tummy with spanx. Endless compliments all day long. My favorite rental ever! Def rent for a wedding or a special event. I wore to work. Perfect for spring and summer. Sooo flattering!
I almost ended up buying this dress because it was so comfortable and flattering. I got tons of compliments on it. Highly recommend!
Really loved this dress especially for spring weather, wore it in quarantine for fun! It probably runs slightly small for TTS but it fit me nicely bc I have a small chest.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but Ref tends to run small!
links_Review_Text: I love Ref, but truly hard to lock in a good look with them without going into a store because their sizes run much smaller!
Great spring/summer dress! I wore this with white sneakers for a more casual look. Reformation runs small so I sized up in this dress and it fit well!

My wedding got canceled/ postponed because of covid but we met with the photographer to get some pics for the new save the dates- this dress worked well but I wish I would have gone bigger! I knew self portrait ran small but had never had a chance to try any of their dresses before.

LOVED this dress, cut and style are absolutely gorgeous and unique. Subtly sexy with nude lining. Only thing is be careful with Self Portrait sizing-- I'm a size 4 in most designers and went up to 10R in this dress. Runs very small!

links_Review_Title: Utterly beautiful, but a little hard to wear.
links_Review_Text: First off I thought this dress would be much more casual than it is. The half lined skirt, the open weaving, it all looked very beachy to me. But in person it has a lot of structure and frankly it's nice enough that I could see someone wanting to get married in it. The two stars off are for the cutaways near the bust. There is literally no bra I could wear with this, it wasn't tight enough to go braless, and gaffer tape would have shown through - even nude. The half lined skirt was not modest enough for me so I added a slip, but my slip wasn't the same shade of nude as what is in the dress, so it looked worse with the extra slip. I considered buying it and have the tailor fix it up just for me. But it's just a little too formal for my lifestyle and I don't think I'd get that much wear out of it. Sooo pretty though!
Sadly due to COViD-19 the party I rented this for was cancelled, I'll definitely rent again because self portrait is my favorite designer!!

Very beautiful dress, the material is high quality and the lining is comfortable. My only critique is this dress is not for folks with full/large breast. At least for me (32DD) the lace stuck out in a way that was not flattering. Everything else was great, but my girls were just too big to have the lace lay correctly.
Really beautiful, good details, perfect weight. I was sad I couldn't wear it! I wear a 32 bra size and could not zip the size 4. Try sizing up!

This dress was beautiful. I am usually a US size 2 and the UK 6R fit pretty well, although the bodice was a little tight. If you are between sizes (especially if you have a larger bust size) I would size up-otherwise just get your normal size (after converting US to UK size of course). Because the bodice was tight it pushed your armpit fat out at the sides, but the lace detail at the bodice covers it up so the dress still looks flattering in photos. It's also a good dress regardless of height, as the tea length works for short or tall people. Great dress to dress up or down.

Gorgeous dress but unfortunately this brand is a bit tricky as it runs small specially on top. If you have big bust this brand might not be for you. I tried a size down and it look great on bottom but tight on top. Size 8 was good on top but huge on the waist and hips. Not for me.
Would be perfect for a picnic! I use RTR for styling my photo shoots, and I love it! This dress was comfortable, fit right, and was beautiful.
The dress fit perfectly! My only concern was the chest area, I was worried my boob my just pop out but it didn't. It was a beautiful dress, lightweight and sexy. Great for warmer weather

links_Review_Title: not worn - party canceled due to corona virus scare.
links_Review_Text: not worn - party canceled due to corona virus scare. Very pretty and flattering fit.
Love this dress! Rented not thinking it would actually look at great as it does! Fits amazing!

Rent this dress. I wore this for a Zoom Easter gathering with my family and absolutely loved it. This dress is incredibly comfortable and flattering. Fits true to size and is forgiving for girls with a fuller chest
Absolutely lovely dress! I felt so beautiful while wearing it - it's the perfect fit to compliment curves!
Beautiful fit and fabric. Comfortable length with a very flattering neckline.

I wore this for my birthday (even in quarantine!) It's so gorgeous - I read other comments and decided to size up, but ended up clamping it for photos, so I would wear my normal siZe next time (18). I am tempted to purchase because I love it so much. Received numerous compliments on it. Very flattering and comfortable. New fave designer!

links_Review_Title: Didn't want to return this dress
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a 0 but the 2 with the belt fits pretty well, not sure if zero will fit better because my bust is a little bigger than a usual zero. I love this and would wear it to wedding and events too.

I cannot day enough about how well constructed this dress is. From the luxe fabric, to the absolutely impeccable finishing, this is an amazing dress. The color is so bright, the battery is delicate, and the belt it very comfortable. It also has pockets!!! Love love love.

links_Review_Title: Coronavirus cancelled my trip to Spain last minute, I decided to still try it on so I know my sizing
links_Review_Text: Runs very small, gorgeous color and fabric, very high quality, just not very forgiving, would absolutely rent again in the right size

links_Review_Title: It is beautiful cut but heavy

I rented this just for fun because I love self portrait and pretty lace dresses. This was a stunner. It fit perfectly as well like it was tailored for me. I hover between a 0 and 2 in dresses depending on the brand. Would be so pretty for a summer wedding!
Absolutely stunning. Planned on wearing it to a wedding but couldn't due to the pandemic. Will rent again for the postponed wedding date.
This is a size 8, labeled correctly on on dress, incorrectly on website

Loved the colors and subtle pattern of this dress. Was maybe a bit different than inwukd have worn normally, but since quarantine has been implemented- I took a risk and loved it. Sleeves are VERY wide at the end, so that was a bit different. But not in a bad way

I tried really hard to make this dress work. First I ordered it in my US size and the lining was so small that I could barely step in to the dress let alone zip it up. But the fabric and style are so cute that I was determined to make it work. So I ordered my UK size (2 sizes up) and this time it was just a little big around the waist and hips. But the top of the dress and its overall length are designed for someone over 6 feet tall. I think someone messed up during drafting and production. I have two other pieces from this brand in my closet, they are UK sized and the fit is spot on. Not sure what happened on this dress.

links_Review_Title: Size up due to small liner
links_Review_Text: While the dress looks lose and float, the liner of the dress is very tight and short, especially in waist. Exterior of dress runs large, liner runs very small. I could have worn for a short time, like a cocktail hour, but to wear for longer in the future I'll size up.

links_Review_Title: Too tight dress lining made this impossible to wear
links_Review_Text: For some insane reason, the dress has an incredibly tight, no stretch little tube skirt as the liner. I have slightly wider than average hips and am a true 4 in all dresses. I could not pull the dress up around my hips and had to put it on over my head and yank the lining down around my hips. I could barely walk and was afraid to wear the dress. The dress itself is beautiful and fit perfectly. Not sure what is going on with the design. Very sad :(

links_Review_Title: I LOVED this top! It was so cute and flattering! The color is so cute too!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a small and I usually wear a small/medium and it fit perfectly. The material was so cool and stretchy while still being tight enough to be form flattering. It was so comfy, I really cannot say enough good things about it. I highly recommend this top!

links_Review_Title: Great for big chest, stretches with wear
Great summer addition to the wardrobe!
links_Review_Text: Great color and great fit...could have size down for a more fitted look. Paired with a colorful skirt and neutral accessories. Got tubs of compliments! Recommend for a summer outing or beach vacay.

I was happy with this top. I love the lilac/lavender color and it was cute on, although unfortunately I never had a chance to wear it out. I got a large for a looser fit, but I think that a M would have worked as well. It hit at my natural waist, right above my belly button. The straps are long so it comes down low in the front, but not too much so. The material is pretty thick and structured, unlike most clothes I've seen, which was flattering.

Light and comfortable. Goal was to look chic during a wine tour- totally works ;) it's a little bit tough when going to the restroom because you need to undo the belt and then unzip. So great/ glad I rented!

links_Review_Title: Cute design/fit is a bit odd
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this and no one else was wearing anything like it. I'm pretty petite and struggled with the fit a little bit. It was the right size, but absolutely zero stretch. The best fit is probably body-skimming all the way down. Not sure it would fit well for hourglass shapes. Pros: comfortable, great length, classic print

links_Review_Title: Fit awkwardly across chest and arms.

As someone else noted it really is not suited to anything approaching an hourglass or pear shape - not flattering to me - but that's fine. I thought it'd be fun for date night, dinner out; lots of other options.

If my budget allowed, this would be mine forever. Size note: if in doubt size up one size. I consider myself a true size 6 but wear about 50/50 size 4 or 6. links_Review_Title: Possibly my favorite rental of all time

I listened to reviews and decided to size up for this dress. However even the larger size was still too small at my hips/waist so I couldn't sit comfortably. I did not wear this dress but the print is so beautiful. I recommend other sizing up one or even two sizes.
Absolutely loved this dress, the fabric and craftsmanship was amazing. However, this dress fits small, especially through the hips.
The dress is absolutely beautiful however, it was rather tight around the bust area as I have a full bust.

links_Review_Title: This dress was comfortable! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit well & true to size. Felt beautiful in it!
To 80s looking for me. Not for people with hips.

Also was able to wear a strapless bra without it showing. Perfect little black dress for a night out or evening wedding! I would rent this again and again.
Wore it with a wide belt

The top of the dress is very large- I have a large chest and wear a size 38D bra and was swimming in the top half of this dress. Decided it was a little too fancy for my vacation. Would consider renting again for the right occasion.

The pictures do not do the fabric justice. The fabric looks very expensive and beautiful. I really love this dress. It fits very well and gave me a nice shape. I wore a regular bra, just tucked in the one strap.
beautiful, soft, luxurious

This dress is everything! Such a fun and flattering fit, I would wear this 10x again and again and was sad to return it. I sized one size up and glad I did! I think my normal size would have been too short

Really loved the look. You can defiantly finagle a bra to work, but it would have been much easier if it wasn't huge. I would definitely size down.

Rented for Easter but didn't come in time - wore it to a virtual class I taught instead. It's very pretty and detailed, the colors are beautiful but it's definitely voluminous! The tie waist helps but it's quite dramatic, you feel like a little doll swimming in ruffles!! This dress would probably look amazing on a tall thin person.

links_Review_Title: Was hoping to wear as Easter dress
links_Review_Text: Loved this, but if you have a large chest I'd size up
Cute statement top for a night out with friends
Didn't end up wearing because it was too wrinkled after traveling in suitcase.

I originally ordered a 12 bc I looked up the brand and saw that it was Australian. I think I ended up wearing an 8, but probably could've done the 6 to get the more hourglass fit (the waist was loose for me, even w the belt) but overall, I am OBSESSED w this dress. The colors are amazing and the material is so nice. 10/10 recommend.

I loved this when it came out and rented it to try it on for an upcoming summer event. Glad I did- it fit everywhere but the bust. I could squeeze in, it just wasn't overly flattering in person. I'll try for a 10! If you are curvy and in between sizes, choose the larger size.
This is fun, flirty dress. It is perfect for warm weather or more informal special occasion. I wore sandals with it to make it less dressy.

During the pandemic I had my 50th bday. I ordered it prior, but had a good time anyway. Just staying at home.. Felt glamorous in it! I would have definitely ordered a size larger. I don't think I would ever wear this in public. For obvious reasons. I'm hoping it just run smaller. It was very comfortable and love the fit. My suggestion would be size up
I absolutely loved this dress... I felt beautiful & confident wearing it. The color really stands out & is the perfect red. 10/10 would recommend.

Loved this dress! The red was very striking which matched the silhouette. I originally ordered an 8 but it was too small so I exchanged for a 10. It was still a little tight but I wouldn't have gone up again. The straps were maybe a little long but I didn't feel like my boobs were going to pop out; they were very secure. There are bones on the side that really emphasize your waist. The slight bunching was very flattering on my tummy.
Received so many compliments. Recommend sizing up! I usually wear an 8 or 10 and I wore a 12 in this dress. Definitely recommend !!

links_Review_Title: Amazing cut dress yet super super small fitting
links_Review_Text: I really loved this dress but it runs extremely small. I tried this on in store and it was recommended to size up TWO whole sizes but I still think it was so tight around my chest. It was not uncomfortable "tight" but I was definitely checking my cleavage all night. The dress was super sexy but I will refrain from shopping from this brand.
Everything about this dress was incredible, the fit was incredibly flattering and the fabric was very good quality and a gorgeous color. Received hundreds of compliments !
It was great for a black tie event.
The dress was gorgeous and got many compliments. Very flattering and beautiful color

links_Review_Title: Felt like this dress was made for me!
links_Review_Text: Fit was like a glove and showed off every curve. Definitely would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Be the center of attention in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I received so many compliments on this dress! It's absolutely stunning. I normally wear a size 8, so I ordered an 8 and a 10. I barely, and I mean, barely, was able to zip the 10. Wish I had gotten a 12, but with Spanx and a day of not eating, I made it work! The fabric is nice and thick, very nice material.
A little lowcut and tight in the torso area, but very beautiful overall.

I tried to spring it up with yellow but you could wear it for fall too with darker colors. I loved this dress! It is on trend with the granny flowers! It was form fitting and had the flattering rousing throughout. Perfect for the hourglass shape!
Just a horror show on me. Way, way too long, too loose in some spots, too tight in others- I just looked foolish in this dress. It was a big no-go and was returned without wearing.
This dress was so beautiful. I loved every detail!! From the little shoulder pad to give it structure to the billowy sleeve and long sash it was so fun to wear!

So cute! Print of little green flowers (looks like clovers until you focus in on it). Would be so cute on St. Patrick's Day - I'm calling dibs for 2021! 😉 I adored the flouncy little ruffles which will swish when you move. The white lining wanted to flip to the outside along front top edge, so I was adjusting that, but no biggie. Didn't have full side zip so was a little tricky to get my wide shoulders through. These 2 points seem nit-picky cos this is just a sweet little dress. Just trying to give you the 411. Ran a smidge small. I'm a 6 but often wear 4 and thought this fit more like a 4. I found it tight through rib area but not unbearable. If you're uncertain size up. I will probably buy this one when it goes on sale, it's just perfect for life here in Florida. Find my other RTR looks on Instagram @agentcheryl. 👋🍀💚
Rented this for work from home. On the shorter side so you will want to wear high waisted pants or shorts. Great for summer with shorts and flat sandals. Felt on trend with this !
fit great and looked great!
The blouse was so much fun to wear! The loved the tied open back and subtly flashy front. I'm small chested so I was able to wear it easily without too much peaking. Definitely will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top with gorgeous lace details
links_Review_Text: Comes with a slip too! The neck was a bit itchy but I left the two top buttons open and it was fine.
Would have loved to have worn this but it was too small around the neck! Will rent it again in a small
Great fit!

Loved this dress. I rented it for a work conference that got cancelled so just wire it for a random Saturday if doing errands around Brooklyn and then out to the theater. I felt like an extra from Girls. So comfortable, on trend, slimming and easy to dress up or down.

links_Review_Title: Wish I could give it 4.5 stars
links_Review_Text: At first, I was skeptical about this dress. The fabric reminded me of a bathrobe. It is a shiny black with a textured background and floral pattern. But the fit was great and I liked it more and more as the day went on. I wore it with black tights and heeled boots. Got a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Soft, airy dress works well for work
links_Review_Text: Airy, flowy fit with a little extra room in a bohemian way. Soft fabric feels elegant and cozy at once. Lovely dress I wore to work and a bar with friends thereafter. Liked dressing it up with a leather jacket for contrast.
Great for work, good for winter with black tights. Overall fit somewhat loose, I had room at the waist with the 6 despite some recent holiday pounds!
This is different than anything I have or wear, yet I absolutely love it. True to size and definitely special!!
Great fit. The dress zippers on the side and has a slimming cut. It was great for an after work holiday party. I got a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Had fun in this pretty dress
links_Review_Text: Looks good on my size 10 figure
The fabric and pattern were beautiful, but I did not like the fit. The waistline was odd. I didn't wear it.
I loved the pattern on this dress, so I wanted to love it, but I could not get the neckline to lay right and it just looked weird
Loved this colorful dress! The fabric is thin so I was a bit chilly in the winter, but would definitely rent again in warmer weather!

links_Review_Title: Beautifully made! Fits like a dream!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to work and received so many compliments. This could definitely be worn all seasons and dressed up or down. Would definitely rent again and might even want to purchase....
It was really a pretty dress that covered up problem areas for me, but it was also put together. I wore it to work and then to a dinner party, so it's perfect for day to night.

links_Review_Title: Super cute with high waisted jeans !
links_Review_Text: Wouldn't be good for super busty people but if you have some boobage you can tie the top tight enough to accentuate your chest a little bit. Loved the sleeves too. Fun for spring

links_Review_Title: BEAUTIFUL Piece. Much better than in pictures.
links_Review_Text: Color is very flattering. Floral overlay is bold and allows for a sexy cutout effect without being obnoxious.

links_Review_Title: Rented this for a conference, but it got canceled due to Covid19.
links_Review_Text: Normally wear an 8, but ordered a 10 and it fit well. It probably depends on body type - I am definitely hourglass. Lined and very high-quality piece. I would not have needed a shaper, and normally I would.
So comfortable and chic. Could probably be made fancier, I wore it with sneakers to work for casual Friday. Love it did much.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but gaps between buttons!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to work and it looked great. I think it would be a better dress for a brunch or shower. Most importantly, beware of the gaps between buttons. There is too much space and it can be inappropriate!

I may rent in warm weather. I wore this once but it was just okay. Not great for winter at all. Looked like 1996 with boots. I wore with tights, but it's verrrry thin. Wish I'd take a pic before sending back!

links_Review_Title: Cute, but not worth the price tag!
links_Review_Text: This is why I love using rent the runway, I can get designer pieces I wouldn't normally buy because I can't justify the price tag. This dress was cute and slightly sheer as mentioned in other reviews. I didn't have any issue with that, but I did wear nude underwear with it. I love it because it's something I wouldn't necessarily buy for my own closet, but was fun and different. Definitely didn't seem like a $500+ dress though.
This dress is gorgeous, but COMPLETELY see-through. Could be a cute cover up and might work with a slip, but definitely was not a winner for work.

The dress is cute but there are two big flaws - 1. You must wear a slip. It's virtually see through. 2. The spacing between the buttons is very wide. It's not so much an issue while standing but as soon as you sit down and there's any tension at any button, you'll be showing more than you bargained for. Again, this is managed if you wear a white slip underneath but it still looks awkward.
received many compliments, wore with black booties
Very versatile, comfortable. Was great for work, dress up or down.

This dress is lightweight and easy to wear. You look put together without trying too hard, though I would definitely recommend boots or booties, as heels would be overkill. The only downside is that the buttons are really far apart and because it's silk, they tend to gape when you're sitting down regardless of how much fabric there is. I would put fashion tape between some of the buttons, but DO NOT pin, as it will ruin the material for future users and would easily rip, given the fabric.
Love
Loved the 90's vibe of this dress for everyday. It hit more empire than I expected, but that made it super flattering on the body and I felt confident all day long.

I was really excited I got to order this. It came brand new with the tags on. Unfortunately, it's basically a sheer nightgown. It would maybe be good as a Bathing suit cover up but definitely not possible as a stand alone dress. At a minimum you need a serious slip - maybe even some skims!

links_Review_Title: Wedding was cancelled (COVID-19) but I rented anyway
links_Review_Text: I was so excited to wear this dress to a spring wedding. Then a global pandemic happened, and the wedding was cancelled. But I love RTR and decided to rent anyway. Besides, who doesn't love to dress up from time to time? I'm so glad I did! Felt beautiful in this dress, and it was a bright spot through an otherwise glum situation. When social distancing measures are less strict I can't wait to wear this again. It was gorgeous, comfortable, and would twirl nicely on the dance floor :)

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress patterns and back!
links_Review_Text: The dress fits really comfortably and I loved the lace-up the back. Would look great one someone with a larger bust!

links_Review_Title: quarantined at home - good time to dress up!
links_Review_Text: the waist was a little tight on me, but i loved the fabric. super lightweight and silky.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful colors and comfy flowy feel
links_Review_Text: Got lots of compliments and I felt fabulous! A little big on the chest but I wore with a sticky bra to fill in the gap and adjusted the strings in the back to tighten. My favorite rental so far!

links_Review_Title: I wore this on two different tropical vacations before finally sending it back. It was stunning!
links_Review_Text: The colors and fabric are gorgeous! This dress is a head turner, for sure. The 4 petite was perfect for my size, and the ability to loosen or tighten the straps means you can make it fit any bust size.
Fits well and comfortable.
I hardly ever leave reviews on here but I really loved this dress! So light and flowy and the colors were gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: Didn’t want to give it back!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding- got lots of compliments! Definitely shows off the girls if you are blessed up top, but provides plenty of support with the ribbing and tie back. Very flattering waistline for all figures and comfy material. Make sure you have someone to help tie you in though!

Overall fit is true to size. I needed assistance getting the back zip and tied. The dress was a little long for me but I didn't wear very high heels and the slit in the front makes it easy to walk. Although people did step on my dress a few times. The bust is very structured and feels a little strange.

links_Review_Title: The dress was very comfortable and I moved easily in it! The print was beautiful, back detail nice!

links_Review_Text: Loved the slit and the print. Was a little too small but still pulled it off. The under layer wasn't quality material but was concealed easy. Many compliments

links_Review_Title: This dress was a SHOWSTOPPER! Absolutely loved it.
links_Review_Text: When I ordered this dress I ordered it with a couple of others to see which one I liked best. The minute I put this dress on I knew it was THE ONE! I wore this dress for a military ball. I got numerous complements. The dress was comfy and true to size. I thought the back would be complicated and hard to tie but it was simple. LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress. Hated that I had to send it back!
Beautiful dress! Very forgiving. Many compliments received. Loved that the back allows you to make it tighter or looser up front!

No picture I took did this dress justice. It is absolutely gorgeous. I wish I could have worn it, but it was far too long for me. Even with the highest heels I have, I would've been tripping over it. The petite length was only available up to size 4. Bummer.

I rented this dress for the annual Night to Shine charity event. Length of the 2R was good on my 5'7" frame with 3" heels. Loved the bright colors on the dark background. Only downside was the ties. It was difficult to get them tight enough by myself, and they ended up being extremely long. But overall, it was a great rental and would highly recommend!
Very well made and flattering!

Beautiful in the picture...even better in person. Super flattering too! If you do rent this dress- make sure you don't tie it too tight. I was so interested in getting the corset tight, I didn't think about the shoulder straps it's attached to. After hour 4 of wearing it, the straps were digging into my shoulders. Still worth it though!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Received many compliments!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing for the gala we attended! It was a too long so I had to wear tall heels but that's okay. Wish I had been able to get a petite size. The bust seemed big at first but once we got it all laced up in back, it was perfect.
Loved the back especially & super soft beautiful fabric.

links_Review_Title: The slit in the front makes your walk Oscar worthy.
links_Review_Text: The tie in the back is a bit tricky. I wish I got a 4 since I'm smaller on top. Beautiful fabric. Has a slit in the front for the leg to peep out while you walk. Makes it even more sexy but flows. It's beautiful. Women kept asking me about my dress and men have a thing for long flow silk dresses. Beautiful over all.

links_Review_Title: Fun Way To Do Formal! Stand out in a sea of black !
links_Review_Text: Back adjustable traps makes this work well for athletic girls with broad shoulders and back. 32DD, 5'7" 130lbs ; perfect length with 3" heels . Beautiful material , lovely vibrant print. I wanted to wear a style other than my go to slim fitted gowns I typically choose. This was so much fun to dance in, swirling around like a ballerina . Not too much fullness in the skirt, just enough to obtain that feminine princes vibe without feeling lost in the fabric. Loved this dress!

This dress was a show stopper. Unfortunately I had to wear a black tank top underneath because the top is so so big and loose. If you relax your shoulders at all get ready to flash the surrounding area. It's a dress where the straps can go as tight as you want, but it has to get uncomfortably tight to get the chest area to fit semi normal.
The boning in the dress was a little unconformable but other than that a great dress!

links_Review_Title: I wore this as my second wedding dress, and it was spectacular.
links_Review_Text: You will definitely need help getting it on, and I had to have the back retightened and tied a few times because it slowly would get a little too loose. I got a tone of compliments, though, and it is very flattering.

links_Review_Title: I have never gotten so many compliments on one dress! It was the perfect fit and flowed very well.
links_Review_Text: Only complaint was that it was slightly too long and I had to hold it up for fear of tripping. I am just shy of 5'9" and wore probably about a 3 inch wedge. I wore a 6 Long. I am not sure if the 6 Regular would have been too short through.

Absolutely no complaints about this dress, it was flattering and SO comfortable! I have had some experiences with RTR that weren't great but this dress renewed my faith. If I could swing the $395 price tag I would buy it for my closet!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress with tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: The dress fit very nicely. It has forgiveness since you can decide how tight you want the back tied. Absolutely beautiful and lightweight. My only complaint is that the strings to tie you up are TOTALLY different lengths. They're sewn in so you can adjust them to be even. We almost ran out of string on one side when tying me up. I had to tuck the other string inside of my dress because it was still so long.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this dress! It looked fabulous on and definitely turned heads.
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, I did not order the correct size and I was unable to exchange it before the event. To make it work I had to wear a short sweater to cover the back since it was too tight and did not look flattering. Definitely a little tricky to get into but worth the effort.
This dress is so much fun. Rent for vacation or summer event!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit and made me feel beautiful
links_Review_Text: This was very comfortable and flattering. I did have to have help from my husband to zip and tie the back but that wasn't a problem at all. I wish I could wear this more!

I got lots of compliments and it was very flattering. However it was long and I had to carry the fabric if my arms even I walked. I'm 5'4 & I wore 2.5 inch heels. would have needed 4+ inch heels. Also I needed to pull the back very very tight in order to make the straps short enough so the dress wasn't too low. It was a bit hard to take deep breaths in the car. I forgot to use tape so the front gapped a bit. If you're on the shorter side or don't want to wear heels get a petite.
The dress looks expensive and is very nicely done, but putting it on is an ordeal.

links_Review_Title: Pretty neckline, fun back, flattering for any body type
links_Review_Text: This dress has the qualities you want in a body loving piece. Our 2nd child is a 6mo old infant, so I've been feeling blah about picking a gown for our HS friend's wedding. You know, my boobs are full, my tummy's not as flat and I still have more weight than I typically do which is mostly in my hips and booty (pear shaped gal). This gown gave me the confidence I hoped for. Adored the Sweetheart neckline - feminine and flattering. There's structured boning in top part & Back laces are so cute

This dress was extremely comfortable, true to size and it hugged all the places I wanted! If you have a large chest don't be afraid to get this dress, however, please tape the girls down! I regretted not taping, but I still received tons of comments! Everyone loved that there was tons of color, especially for a winter holiday event where most people wear black. I did have an issue with it ripping. The material is thin and loves to flow, which means it is susceptible to people stepping on it.
I would highly recommend this to anyone especially with all the spring wedding season coming up this is a gorgeous! I fit me so nicely and made me feel fabulous!

links_Review_Title: I received the absolute BEST compliments the evening of our Gala. AMAZING DRESS!
links_Review_Text: Fit: Perfect. I'm 5'3" and wore a size 4R. However, I should have selected petite length. It was a bit long. Pros/Cons: Pros are that this entire process has been absolutely flawless. I loved the dress. It's easy, and I will definitely use this service again. Cons: None.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! Different and striking with all the beautiful colors.
links_Review_Text: It's tight through the rib cage, but adjustable with the corset and forgiving below the rib cage with a flowy skirt that moves well. The corset is a bit tricky to figure out so leave time to play with it, and make sure your significant other (or someone else) can tie it! Overall loved it and got lots of compliments.
I loved this dress but it would be more suited for a beach event than a cold weather formal. You'll need to find support for "the girls" because there is none.

links_Review_Title: Really fun, but didn't end up wearing
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a Miami wedding in January. I was looking for something light, fun and colorful for a black tie wedding- this certainly fit the bill. I was a little disappointed in the fabric quality- it didn't feel as fancy as I was hoping for. I also had a little trouble getting the back of the dress laced well without help. Even with good lacing, I still felt like it was squeezing my back a little- not the most flattering.

This dress is amazing! The back detail, front slit, and soft flowy fabric made this dress so unique and flattering. I didn’t even have to worry with spanx. So comfortable! I have small bust but this dress would work for a large bust. I like that the back can be adjusted to make it loose or tight. I got compliments all night! I did size up 1 size bc most dresses are tight on my rib cage area but I could have probably worn my usual size bc of the adjustable back.

links_Review_Title: Cute but watch out for the top
links_Review_Text: I rented this for work from home - because why not. It is very much like a prom dress. It is pretty and a bit old Hollywood with a tie dye twist. However, this dress is a risk for a wardrobe malfunction if tied the way the photo on RTR shows. You might need to get creative to keep covered.
The print and fabric (velvet) are beautiful but I spent the entire day pulling it down. The lining would rise up and so would the dress.

links_Review_Title: Super cute and fits like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Really cute and fits just right! A little short than what I normally go for but with tights I'll feel confident.

The dress fit well and my husband remarked that he "liked this more than billowy looks". I wore with black tights luckily because the front would not stop rolling up. I had to walk and keep the hem down at the same time. BUT did get compliments at dinner!

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress but runs small on the bottom!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress and wasn't expecting the velvet material, but unfortunately I couldn't wear it because the bottom half was too tight! I would recommend ordering a size up!
Trendy and nice dress but because of the fabric the dress rides up all the time, especially when walking.
It took me a second to figure out how to get it on correctly, but once I did, I never wanted to take it off! It's so elegant and chic!

Wore this with jeans and sandals to get some drinks during the day but could definitely dress it up with heels for a nighttime look! Didn't wear a bra obviously but had no problems with over exposure lol. Would definitely rent again!
Can't wait to wear this in the summer! Definitely need petals with it and it rides up a little if you have bigger boobs. Otherwise it's amazing.
Loved the cut, color and silky material - so much fun to wear
I wore this top for NYE. I wore it off the shoulder fit perfectly

I wore this piece with a rust vince asymmetrical skirt for my baby shower. These two separates fooled my guests into believing it was a one piece dress. I rented the XL to have the loose fit and to sit comfortably above my belly (and big boobs lol). Needed some help to make sure the fabric was secured, it was droop unflatteringly if not properly pinned. Loved!
I was surprised at how cropped this top was, the model does not show that. it was super cute but not flattering
This top was a lot shorter than how it looks in the picture. Fit more like a crop top. Pretty sheer, so sticky boobs are recommended.
This was supposed to be a Birthday Party dress. While the color is absolutely beautiful, the dress was so small, it barely went over my head. So disappointed

This was for a date that didn't happen, but I'm still glad I rented it since I know how it'll fit for a future event. As far as Hervé goes, this one is more forgiving. If you're new to this maker, I recommend starting with this one. It's a great starter-Hervé. :D
This dress is beautiful and the color is stunning. It fits very differently than it does on the model. Very short, very tight. I rented it for a wedding. It was in appropriate for the event.
I rented both the small and then the xs. They both did not hold my girls up like I needed them to. Other herve's fit amazingly! Just not this one

I would have given it 5 stars except the shoulders were a little tight when zipping/unzipping. This was very pretty, more flattering in person, I think, than the pictures show. I wore if for date night (dinner and bowling) then again for pandemic date night at home. I just felt so chic every time I put it on! I will rent this one again.
The fabric is great and it is very comfortable however it is better suited for the taller ladies.

links_Review_Title: CUTEST romper ever. I want to wear it over and over.
links_Review_Text: I have broad shoulders and a larger chest so I automatically got an XL instead of a L and the XL fit perfectly. I also could not zip this myself so make sure you have someone or can ask someone. I wore this to a Texas country concert and it was absolutely perfect. I could see myself wearing this out to bars or a date. (Just change what shoes you're wearing!) It is a short inseam but the ruffles conceal any rogue cheeks. Would def rent again.
